ModMetaData.name: Frog
ModMetaData.author: Metzkermeister
ModMetaData.description: Frog. "Inspired" by ZWAnimals' Frog and HC_Animal_2's Bullfrog. V 1.0.1 - Added textures for dead frogs. :( V 1.0.2 - Added frog attacks, fixed textures for dead frog. V 1.0.3 - Nerfed the value of frog eggs. V 1.0.4 - Added filth. Increased egg laying interval. Reduced attack power. Increased wildness. V 1.0.5 - Decreased frog size. V 1.0.6 - Changed texture for dessicated (not dead) frog to a new custom skeleton. V 1.0.7 - Added "Support" for Rimworld V1.4
